title: Kabul mosque targeted by bomb, ‘a number of civilians’ dead: Taliban
content:
1. Kabul mosque targeted by bomb, ‘a number of civilians’ dead: Taliban  New York Post
  2. Blast targeting Kabul mosque leaves 'a number of civilians dead,' Taliban spokesman says  CNN
  3. A bombing at a Kabul mosque has left multiple civilians dead  NPR
  4. Explosion Occurs Near Kabul Mosque, Casualties Reported | TOLOnews  TOLOnews
  5. Multiple civilians killed in blast outside Kabul mosque hosting prayer service for Taliban leader's mother  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
